doc.title: Mundo VIP
doc.plot: 50 minute weekly show covering show business from Hollywood movies, to Brazilian "novelas" and Portugal's film, theater and music scenes with interviews and reports made all over the world. Hosted by Felipa Garnel (1996-2001), Margarida Pinto Correia (1996-1997) and Paulo Pires (1997-2001) at SIC Television in Portugal
